attributes.action: Act immediately and with force if necessary to free the 15 Navy officers being wrongly held in IRAN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 15 Navy officers were wrongly imprisoned in Iran over the last week. Government around the world are seeking a diplomatic solution while our troops are being paraded and manipulated on world television. Our troops deserve more respect than this and it goes against everything we believe as a people. Something needs to be done and it needs to be done sooner than later. Do we really want to show the Iranians we are weak?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
